text:
US Justice Department Formally Appeals Judge's Immigration Ruling Share 
The U.S. Justice Department has formally filed an appeal regarding the court ruling from a federal judge in Washington who put a stay on President Donald Trump's executive order regarding immigration. BREAKING: Justice Dept. formally appeals court ruling that suspended Trump's immigration ban https://t.co/HTYn7n1qol pic.twitter.com/VzlssVEuZ2
